content: a chain and how to double_crochet http //www mooglyblog com/learn-how-to-crochet/ left-handed video http //www mooglyblog com/how-to-crochet-left-handed/ share your blanket with #dreamvalleyblanket on instagram please feel free to sell finished items made from this pattern and give design credit as dream valley blanket crochet pattern by pretty peaceful not for commercial use please do not share photos of this pattern only share the link to the pattern pdf on ravelry or etsy thank you for your support dream valley blanket crochet pattern © 2023 by susan kennedy of pretty peaceful
